description: Explore Tesla's groundbreaking open source licensing approach under Elon Musk's leadership. Learn about its impact on the automotive industry, the challenges it poses, and the ethical considerations surrounding sustainable transport.
keywords: Tesla, Elon Musk, open source, licensing, automotive industry, sustainable transport, innovation, electric vehicles, patents, sustainability, corporate responsibility, open source strategy
title: Tesla and Open Source Licensing: Elon Musk's Vision
